pages.title: Elemental String
pages.text: String imbued with elemental magick can be wrapped around tools and equipment to add special effects. $(br2)This elemental effect functions as a unique enchantment mechanism, where the elemental string gradually depletes with each use until it is completely consumed. $(br2)You can remove the elemental string from an item by submerging it in water.

A sword imbued with arc energy and a helmet imbued with void energy are examples of wearable equipment and durability-based equipment that can be combined with elemental string. However, each item can only hold a maximum of two types of elemental string. Repeatedly combining the same type of elemental string will overwrite the durability of the previous string rather than stack it.
